definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: hole;—abs. [[חׂר]] 2Ki 12:10, Ez Eze 8:7 (del. Co B etc.), [[חוֹר]] Ct So 5:4, [[חׂרִים]] 1Sa 14:11; cstr. [[חׂרֵי]] Job 30:6; sf. [[חׂרָיו]] Na 2:13, [[חׂרֵיהֶן]] Zec 14:12; —hole in lid of chest 2Ki 12:10 (made by boring, [[נקב]]), in door Ct So 5:4; in wall Ez Eze 8:7 (v. supra); = eye-socket ´[[עיניו תִּמַּקְנׇה בְּח]] Zec 14:12 (plague of enemies of Jerusalem); holes as hiding-places for men 1Sa 14:11, so also 1Sa 13:6 Ew We Dr (for MT [[חוחים]]), dwelling of outcast people [[חרי עָפָר]] Job 30:6; of dens of lions Na 2:13.—I. [[חׂר]], v. II. [[חור]]. p. 301
